the serial is 8249-7ee3-84ew-txgt.   by the way to play this game you are going to need the crack. if you have mounted the file to a virtual drive right click it and click explore. then go to the folder called _CRACK. there is the serial and crack in this folder. to get the game to work after you have installed it go to the folder _CRACK (mentioned above) and right click the file "NfsHP2" and click copy. then go to your install directory (default C:\Program Files\EA Games\Need for speed hot pursuit 2 and delete the file called "NFSHP2". Then right click an empty space and click paste. And there you go!  A cracked working version of NFSHP2!
